statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Tanzanian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${8.50} per pound with some Terraza coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.10} per pound to create \displaystyle{90} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.44} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
